title: Crust-less Coconut Pecan Pie 6    Tbsp   margarine 1     cup  sugar 1/2  cup flour 1/4     tsp. salt 2    eggs 1   tsp. Vanilla 3/4  cup  pecans  (chopped) 1    cup  coconut Melt margarine over low heat.  Beat eggs  one minute. Mix flour, sugar, and salt.  Add  this mixture to eggs and beat till  smooth.  The longer you beat the more meringue-like the topping  will be.  Add the melted margarine and beat well.  Stir in vanilla, pecans and coconut and mix well.  Pour into well greased and floured Pyrex pie plate. Bake 30-35 minutes at 325 degrees  Cool  before slicing.   Delicious with whip cream.
